description:
The series is set in the mechanical city of Edoropolis (a portmanteau of "Edo" and "metropolis", called "Little Tokyo" in the dub) is a mechanical city which fuses feudal Japanese culture with 1990s culture and is populated by cybernetic anthropomorphic "animaloids", or animal androids. The city is notionally led by Shogun Iei-Iei Tokugawa ("Emperor Fred" in the dub), but as he is a doddering eccentric, the city`s actual leadership lies in the hands of his daughter Tokugawa Usako (Princess Violet) and a council headed by the ambitious prime minister Kitsunezuka Ko`on-no-Kami (Seymour "The Big" Cheese; identified as a fox in the original, but a rat in the dub), who constantly plots to overthrow the Shogun with the help of his trusted advisor Karasu Gennarisai (Jerry Atric), and Karamaru (Bad Bird), the leader of an army of ninja crows.
Unknown to the prime minister, council member Inuyama Wanko-no-Kami (Big Al Dente), the commander of the Palace Guard, learns of his designs on leadership, but is unable to prosecute him for treason because of the plausible deniability he maintains. Instead, Inuyama enlists the services of Yattarou (Speedy Cerviche), Pururun (Polly Esther), Sukashii (Guido Anchovy) and their operator Otama (Francine), four cyborg cat ninjas (samurai in the dub) who work in the city`s pizzeria. Also known as the Nyankii, they are assigned to to stop Kitsunezuka Ko`on-no-Kami and his evil henchmen`s plans to take over Edoropolis.
Source: Wikipedia
Note 1: The story & concept shown in America was altered from the original Japanese. That happened due to the dubbing team not having any info, script or translations on the show, and decided to make up what they couldn`t understand, simply from what they could figure out just by watching it.
Note 2: Episodes http://anidb.net/e22364 [10] and http://anidb.net/e22367 [51] were not dubbed into English and therefore never released to the English audience.

REGULAR.description:
Speedy is serving a pizza to Lucille but then Guido pops up and steals the Pizza to deliver it for Lucille himself. As they continue to reach their destination, they continuously steal the pizza from each other. When Speedy gives it to Lucille, Guido says that Lucille and he are in love, and they two get into a brawl. Lucille stops them by blowing them up. Meanwhile, Bad Bird sends out a giant robotic dragon and it wreaks havoc on Little Tokyo. Speedy and Guido notices Ninja Crows inside the Dragon and they decide to defeat this machine before it demolishes every structure in the city.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Larguem o Dragão do Gato em Paz
秘密忍者隊ニャンキー出動!

REGULAR.description:
Lucille`s brother, Wally, is captured by the Ninja Crows and hypnotized for being the driver of the giant Sushi making robot.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: If You Knew Sushi Like I Know Sushi
街中おスシだ! パニックだ!

REGULAR.description:
Bad Bird found a document which says that gold is hidden beneath the Little Tokyo castle. With the help of Ninja Crows he manages to hijack the train with the Lucille being one of the passengers. They are ordered to dig to find the gold.  Meanwhile, Pizza Cats realized that Lucille hasn`t returned home yet. Speedy suggests that she is aboard that hijacked train. Pizza Cats go to the tunnel to find her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ホレホレ穴掘れもっと掘れ!

REGULAR.description:
A huge golden statue which grants wishes, for a fee, is used by the bad guys as a Trojan Horse to get into a rich man`s house.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nayami o Kaiketsu? Card de Chin!
悩みを解決? カードでチーン!

REGULAR.description:
Princess Vi enlists Speedy to help search for a ghost in the palace
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Idol Tanjou? Geinoukai no Amai Wana
アイドル誕生? 芸能界の甘いワナ

REGULAR.description:
Polly Ester and Lucille become a hit in Little Tokyo as the singing group The Pointless Sisters. Little do they know that they are really a front for bad guys attempt of hypnotize the population.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 探検! オテンバ姫の遊園地

REGULAR.description:
Little Tokyo becomes a dump for toxic potato peelings, in exchange the rich get richer. Meanwhile, the Big Cheese tries to steal a Nuclear Potato that is on the ship.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Maji!? Karamaru ga Hero ni Naru Hi?
マジ!? カラ丸がヒーローになる日?

REGULAR.description:
Guido meets a pretty girl, but Big Cheese has sent the Ninja Crows after her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kowaai? Koon no Kami no Himitsu
こわーい? コーン守のヒ・ミ・ツ

REGULAR.description:
Princess Vi puts on a disguise and sneaks out of the palace to attend the festival as a commoner. Pizza Cats are sent to protect her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 姫はウキウキ! みんなハラハラ!

REGULAR.description:
Clips and scenes from the first nine episodes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: てやんでえ! これがニャンキーでえ

REGULAR.description:
Speedy helps a kid search for his father, the inventor Prof. Ohm, who claimed to have invented something to increase the power of any kind of energy. The Big Cheese is holding him hostage to get him to apply his invention to their weather machine.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ijimerarekko no Papa wa Tensai Kagakusha!?
いじめられっ子のパパは天才科学者!?

REGULAR.description:
The Bad Guys gather in a movie theater to watch their past mistakes and look for the Pizza Cats` weakness.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chin Play Kou Play! Nyankee no Jakuten!
珍プレー好プレー!ニャンキーの弱点!

REGULAR.description:
After discovering the Pizza Cats are solar powered the Big Cheese has a satellite launched that will block out the sun. The Pizza Cats try to stop the launch but come up against the Rude Noise.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nyankee Haiboku? Yami no Yoninshuu Arawaru!
The Pizza Cats Are Only Human (Part 1)
ニャンキー敗北? ヤミの四忍衆あらわる!

REGULAR.description:
The Pizza Cats turn to Guru Lou in hopes that he can help them to defeat the Rude Noise.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Pizza Cats Are Only Human (Part 2)
逆転! ニャンキー空を飛ぶ

REGULAR.description:
The Pizza Cats have been getting a big reputation in Little Tokyo. The Big Cheese, now jealous, decides to build his reputation by sending a robot out to attack, but make the Big Cheese look like the hero instead of the Cats.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Onegai! Koon no Kami wa Ninki ga Hoshii
Quand le chat n’est pas là...
お願い! コーン守は人気がほしい

REGULAR.description:
The Big Cheese gets a picture of a potato farmer who looks mysteriously like Emperor Fred. Al Dente then sends the Pizza Cats to find the nanny that raised the Emperor, in hopes that she can identify the true Emperor. However, Big Cheese knows of the plan and sends the Ninja Crows and the Rude Noise to get her first.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Case of the Bogus Billionaire
Un empereur peut en cacher un autre
ウッソー! 将軍さまはニセモノ!?

REGULAR.description:
The Big Cheese is having scientists kidnapped to be forced to work on his secret weapon. Now the Ninja Crows are after Guru Lou.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ドコだ? 消えた大先生

REGULAR.description:
The Bad Guys use a mind controlling robot on a popular baseball player Princess Vi has a crush on. To impress her, they challenge the Pizza Cats to a baseball game.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 見合って見合って野球で勝負

REGULAR.description:
Speedy makes a date with Lucille but he forgets that he also made a date with Polly to run some low level missions. He decides to zip back and forth between his engagements . Between dates he uncovers the Big Cheese`s plan to attack Little Tokyo with a giant Hot Tub robot.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Double Date wa Kiken ga Ippai!
Wデートは危険がイッパイ!

REGULAR.description:
Polly decides she needs to be less temperamental so she goes to a model school, which is really a front for the Big Cheese`s plan hire some women warriors.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: エッ!? プルルンのお嬢様宣言

REGULAR.description:
Big Cheese builds a robot that can bang out a hypnotic drum beat, thus enslaving the town.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Drummin` Up Trouble With a Big Bad Beat
ポンポコタヌキで大騒ぎ!

REGULAR.description:
The Big Cheese is short on cash and can no longer afford to pay his minions. As a result the Ninja Crows have to go find day jobs. Bad Bird takes a job at the Pizza Cat pizzeria. For the first time in his life Bad Bird knows real job satisfaction and is torn between his duty to live up to the evil legacy of his father and his desire to seek his own path to personal happiness. The episode foreshadows events to come in the series finale and Bad Bird and Speedy form a bond of friendship.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Pizza Cats haben einen Vogel
カラスがピザ持って特急便?

REGULAR.description:
Princess Vi wants to make a movie so the Big Cheese, Guido and Speedy run an obstacle course which will determine the male lead.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Big Cheese Shows His Filmy Substance
Gekitotsu! Eiga no Shuyaku wa Dare Da?
激突! 映画の主役はだれだ?

REGULAR.description:
A child becomes attached to the Big Cheese, so Princess Vi orders him to open a diaper cleaning service. The kid and the cleaning causes delays with his latest giant robot, the Samurai Stamper.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rere? Koon no Kami ni Kodomo!?
れれっ? コーン守に子供!?

REGULAR.description:
Francine`s date with a deer name Bucky is ruined when the Bad Guys release a swarm of butterflies that can make people act like the opposite gender.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: かわいい? ヤッ太郎女になる

REGULAR.description:
Emperor Fred comes down with a bad cold. Big Al Dente summons the Pizza Cats to go to Mount Coochie to bring back the CooCoo bird which will restore Emperor Fred`s insanity and cure his cold. But the Big Cheese also has a cold and he sends Bad Bird to get the CooCoo bird first.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 大冒険! ゼッコー鳥をさがせ

REGULAR.description:
There is a flaw in the palace. The Pizza Cats are sent to find the architech, who has been banished to an island by Princess Vi, but the Ninja Crows are after him too.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cold and Crabby in Little Tokyo
ヤダ! オイラ達が島流し?

REGULAR.description:
Big Al isn`t satisfied with the Pizza Cats` work, so he sends them to the suburbs, while the Rescue Team Cats take over the main shop.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ヘッ? ニャンキーが解散?!

REGULAR.description:
The Rude Noise spy on the Pizza Cats to try and find a way to beat them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: バレた!? ニャンキーの正体

REGULAR.description:
Guido feels left out when Polly, Lucille, and even Speedy become music stars. But now it`s up to him to save the city from Big Cheese`s singing.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: アイドル伝説? スカシー出動

REGULAR.description:
Big Cheese decides to marry his way up, so the Bad Guys make a cupid robot to make Princess Vi fall in love with him, but things don`t go as planned.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tsurai ze Karamaru! Ninja no Koi
つらいぜカラ丸! 忍者の恋

REGULAR.description:
Big Cheese discovers a legend about a flute that can be used to find a treasure, so he collects all the flutes in the city, including Polly`s.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: プルルンの笛はおとぎ話

REGULAR.description:
Speedy befriends a pig from space, but this pig`s appetite is out of control.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Close Encounters of the Pig Kind
ふしぎ?! 星から来たお友だち!

REGULAR.description:
After reviewing their previous encounters with the Pizza Cats, the Big Cheese decides to combine the features from previous robots into one.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hisshou Sakusen! Tsuyoi zo Karakara Ichizoku
必勝作戦! 強いぞカラカラ一族

REGULAR.description:
Spritz disappears while making a delivery to a lakeside village, where mysterious creatures have been frightening the locals.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: さがせ! 湖に消えたネッキー

REGULAR.description:
The city is in terrorized by a group of exploding robot teens. And to make things worse, Guru Lou is testing his new formula.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: もやせ青春! また出た大先生

REGULAR.description:
Bad Bird is back with powerful new weapons, and challenges Speedy to a battle. Can Speedy defeat him?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: まさか!? ヤッ太郎夕日に死す

REGULAR.description:
Speedy goes to Guru Lou to learn the secret of the Pizza Cats` power.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Taose Karamaru! Namida, Namida no Daifukkatsu
たおせカラ丸! 涙, 涙の大復活

REGULAR.description:
The Pizza Cats travel to meet the New York Pizza Cats. The Big Cheese also goes to New York for a crime conference.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ハロー! ヤッ太郎海外へ飛ぶ

REGULAR.description:
A flying saucer appears, and kidnaps Princess Vi. The Pizza Cats have to rescue her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: UFO!? ニャンキー対宇宙人

REGULAR.description:
Princess Vi`s mother returns, and gives Vi a jem that the Big Cheese needs for his latest robot.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: とんでる! 帰ってきた母上

REGULAR.description:
The Pizza Cats go to a spa to protect Emperor Fred and Princess Vi, but Big Cheese and the Ninja Crows are there too, trying to get some rest and relaxation.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dairansen de Ii Yu Da na!?

REGULAR.description:
Princess Vi holds a martial arts fighting contest to see who is the top fighter in the city. The Pizza Cats, Lucille, Bad Bird and one of Big Cheese`s robots are among the entrants into battle.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 全員集合! 天下一の大試合

REGULAR.description:
The bad guys steal the Speedy`s magical Ginzu Sword and make a copy of it.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ピンチ! 盗まれたマサマサ

REGULAR.description:
Jerry and Bad Bird builds a robot that brings luck. It was supposed to be delivered to Big Cheese, but was lost to Speedy instead. While trying to get the robot back, they give the Bad Luck robot to the Big Cheese.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gaku! Mijime na Koon no Kami
ガクッ! みじめなコーン守

REGULAR.description:
The Big Cheese builds a robot that can travel through time. His plan is to travel back in time to stop the Pizza Cats from being formed. Unbeknownst to him, the Pizza Cats are on their way to the palace to celebrate the anniversary of their formation. Big Cheese, Bad Bird, and the Cats accidentally get sent back in time with the robot and the Cats try to stop Big Cheese from meeting up with Jerry Atric and the Ninja Crows.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 時をかけるニャンキー!

REGULAR.description:
Big Cheese, Jerry, and Bad Bird dress up like the Pizza Cats to ruin the cats` reputations.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 出た! にせニャンキー

REGULAR.description:
Big Cheese is having a bad Christmas, so he dress up like Santa and gives kids masks that won`t come off.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ニャンキーサンタ空を行く

REGULAR.description:
Speedy gives Princess Vi`s pizza to Emperor Fred, who ruins it. The Princess has a temper tantrum and banishes both of them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ヤッ太郎おつかれ島流し

REGULAR.description:
The Ninja Crows build and earthquake creating robot, which terrifies Speedy, and Big Cheese.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 幻ナリ斎のワハハ大作戦!

REGULAR.description:
A series of clips from the series.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: How Mortifying! Large Research of Big Cheese
Kii! Koon no Kami no Daikenkyuu
きーっ! コーン守の大研究

REGULAR.description:
In a last desperate act the Big Cheese diverts a comet towards Little Tokyo and blackmails the city. Can the Pizza Cats stop the Big Cheese before he destroys Little Tokyo...?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Koon no Kami Shijou Saidai no Sakusen!
コーン守史上最大の作戦!

REGULAR.description:
Speedy and Bad Bird join forces to save the world from the comet.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 明日もぜったい日本晴れ!

REGULAR.description:
A look back at memorable moments from the series.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ニャンキーは不滅です!

titles.title: キャッ党忍伝てやんでえ
